metadata.description: Research-driven project scaffolding for mobile, backend, and web applications. Supports SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose, Expo React Native, Node/Express, Django, Rust, Next.js, and Nuxt.js.

plugins.name: eagle-multi-stack-scaffolder
plugins.description: Research-driven scaffolding for SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose, Expo React Native, Node/Express, Django, Rust, Next.js, and Nuxt.js. Automatically researches best practices, recommends dependencies, and generates production-ready project structures.
